entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Murdochville

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late this afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and local blowing snow beginning this evening. Local amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 05 March 2023
